class oop.SchoolManagementSystem[source]

Bases: QMainWindow

Main class for the School Management System GUI application. Handles student, instructor, and course management including adding, deleting, and editing records, as well as course registration.

add_course()[source]

Adds a new course to the system based on the form input fields. Saves the course data to the JSON file and database, then clears the input fields.

add_instructor()[source]

Adds a new instructor to the system based on the form input fields. Saves the instructor data to the JSON file and database, then clears the input fields.

add_student()[source]

Adds a new student to the system based on the form input fields. Saves the student data to the JSON file and database, then clears the input fields.

assign_course()[source]

Assigns the instructor to the selected course and updates the course assignment in the database.

create_course_tab()[source]

Creates and sets up the Course tab in the GUI, which allows the user to add a new course and associate it with an instructor.

create_display_tab()[source]

Creates the ‘Records’ tab for viewing, searching, editing, and exporting records.

create_instructor_tab()[source]

Creates and sets up the Instructor tab in the GUI, which allows the user to add a new instructor and assign them to a course.

create_student_tab()[source]

Creates and sets up the Student tab in the GUI, which allows the user to add a new student and register them for a course.

delete_record()[source]

Deletes the selected record from the records table and the corresponding JSON file. If the record is of type “Student”, “Instructor”, or “Course”, it is removed from the respective dictionary and the updated data is saved back to the corresponding JSON file.

edit_record()[source]

Allows the user to edit a selected record from the table.

export_to_csv()[source]

Exports the current records to a CSV file selected by the user.

load_all_records()[source]

Loads all records (students, instructors, courses) into the table for display.

load_data(filename)[source]

Loads and returns the data from the specified JSON file.

register_course()[source]

Registers the student for the selected course and updates the course registration in the database.

save_data(filename, data)[source]

Saves the provided data to the specified JSON file.

save_record(item, record_id, record_type)[source]

Saves changes made to a record after editing.

search_records()[source]

Searches for records in the table that match the search query and hides rows that do not match.

show_error_message(title, message)[source]

Displays an error message dialog box with the specified title and message.

Parameters:

  • title (str) – The title of the error message box.

  • message (str) – The content of the error message.

update_instructor_course_dropdown()[source]

Updates the course dropdown for the Instructor tab with the list of courses without assigned instructors.

update_student_course_dropdown()[source]

Updates the course dropdown for the Student tab with the list of available courses.

class oop.Student(name: str, age: int, email: str, student_id: str)[source]
